Row.Text: Civilian units ignore all Movement penalties for crossing rivers, and +2 [ICON_Movement] Movement. Builders can accelerate progress of districts and projects.
Buy Traders for free, Units, Buildings, Districts cost 20% less [ICON_Gold] Gold. Cities gain standart yield from incoming trade routes.

A constrution team direct under Yuheng, have mass amount of buildcharges. Can build improvements, routes and railroad, speed up progress of districts and projects, but cost population.[NEWLINE]Will retreat when captured.

Replace.Text: 平民单位无视河流的移动力惩罚，并获得2点额外 [ICON_Movement] 移动力，建造者可花费使用次数加速区域和项目的进度。
可免费购买商人，购买单位、建筑和区域时花费 [ICON_Gold] 金币-20%。商业中心和港口每有2点邻接加成便为此区域中的建筑+20%[ICON_Gold]金币，至多生效10点邻接加成。通向本文明城市的商路为城市提供标准产出。

Row.Text: 一支直接效命于玉衡星本人的工程队伍，有极大量行动力。能建造改良设施、道路和铁路、加速区域与项目建造，但需要消耗人口组建。[NEWLINE]在遇敌时会撤退。
